channel.title: The System cannot find the path specified
channel.description:
The System cannot find the path specified."
It said that for the past 3 sources I downloaded.
Any help?

item.title: The System cannot find the path specified
item.dc:creator: @ni562 ni562
item.description:
@ni562 wrote:

[quote=“Team_Rocket, post:5, topic:428999”]Use this:

@echo off
cd …
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_02\bin\javac.exe” -cp . -d ./bin/ ./DavidScape/*.java
pause[/quote]

thanks

Read full topic
item.source: The System cannot find the path specified

@lemme_winks wrote:

what gets me is why you have java 7u2 and you are trying to invoke a version of java 6?

item.title: The System cannot find the path specified
item.dc:creator: @ni562 ni562
item.description:
@ni562 wrote:

[quote=“Team_Rocket, post:2, topic:428999”]1. Post the contents of the .Batch file you’re trying to run.
2. Post which version of JDK you’re running.[/quote]
JDK 7u2

@echo off
cd …
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_11\bin\javac.exe” -cp . -d ./bin/ ./DavidScape/*.java
pause
